definition: holy land (of a religion)/sacred place/shrine/holy city (such as Jerusalem, Mecca etc)/center of historic interest
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
Santiago, capital of Chile/San Diego, California
Boko Haram, Islamic insurgent group in north Nigeria
(Tw) San Diego, California/Santiago, capital of Chile

sentences.english: The sacred place of the revolution invites a good many visitors.
sentences.chinese: 革命聖地吸引着許許多多的參觀者。

sentences.english: One of the Meccas for the leading physicists of that time was in Gottingen.
sentences.chinese: 那個時候引導物理學家的麥加聖地之一，是哥廷根。

sentences.english: From the Chilean capital of Santiago, the epicenter about 590 km.
sentences.chinese: 震中距智利首都聖地亞哥市約590公里。

sentences.english: Jewish holy sites were not maintained, and their cemeteries had been desecrated .
sentences.chinese: 因此猶太人的聖地不再得到維護，墓園被褻瀆。

sentences.english: A team at U. C. San Diego had been searching for it.
sentences.chinese: 加大聖地牙哥校區的研究小組一直在尋找這個反射器。

sentences.english: Cambodians and other groups in San Diego were in a similar situation.
sentences.chinese: 聖地亞哥的柬埔寨人和其他團體也處於同樣境地。

sentences.english: See the Buddhist holy places, and far to see iron temple, incense quite sheng. Run!
sentences.chinese: 看到佛家聖地了，遠遠看見鐵林寺，香火蠻盛的。

sentences.english: Therefore it's quite natural to feel spiritual emotion in the dhama.
sentences.chinese: 因此在聖地感受到靈性情感是十分自然的。

sentences.english: Chinese ammunitions enterprises regularly attend the Santiago Air Show every two years.
sentences.chinese: 中國彈藥企業每兩年一次定期參加聖地亞哥航空展。

sentences.english: When the barge reached the shrine, acolytes removed the pall.
sentences.chinese: 當駁船抵達聖地時，輔祭除去了柩衣。

sentences.english: Thou art the All-pervading Spirit, but I have made pilgrimages to sacred places.
sentences.chinese: 你是遍及所有的精神，但我卻朝拜聖地。

sentences.english: We like to spend a lot of time in San Diego.
sentences.chinese: 我們喜歡在聖地亞哥呆很久。

sentences.english: The ancient battlefield has become something holy. It was almost untouched.
sentences.chinese: 古戰場成了聖地，它幾乎保持着當年的風貌。

sentences.english: Nagarahole, The Shop or The Shrine?
sentences.chinese: 納加爾霍雷，店鋪，還是聖地？

sentences.english: San Diego State University is a 5-minute drive away.
sentences.chinese: 聖地亞哥國際機場距離酒店有5分鐘車程。

sentences.english: But Raúl had no such announcements to make in Santiago.
sentences.chinese: 但是，勞爾在聖地亞哥的演說中並沒有這樣的聲明。

definition: first choice/premium/to come first in the imperial examinations
